exercises.name: Sun Salutation (Surya Namaskar)
exercises.description: A flowing sequence of 12 yoga poses that improves flexibility, strength, and boosts heart rate.

exercises.name: Warrior Pose Sequence
exercises.description: Includes Warrior I, II, and III poses to strengthen legs, improve balance and posture.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Stand upright and jump while spreading your legs and arms; return to start position.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Start in a plank position and rapidly alternate knees toward your chest.

exercises.name: Cool-down Stretch
exercises.description: Gentle seated and lying stretches to release tension and relax muscles.

exercises.name: Warm-up Ride
exercises.description: Ride at an easy pace to prepare muscles and raise heart rate slightly.

exercises.name: Moderate-Speed Ride
exercises.description: Maintain a steady pace where talking becomes slightly difficult.

exercises.name: Interval Sprints
exercises.description: Cycle fast for 30 seconds, then slow pace recovery for 1 minute.

exercises.name: Cool-down Ride
exercises.description: Easy pedaling to return heart rate to normal and relax leg muscles.

exercises.name: Dynamic Vinyasa Flow
exercises.description: A continuous flow of yoga poses synchronized with breathing, boosting flexibility and strength.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Jog in place while lifting knees as high as possible, engaging your core.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bend knees and lower into a squat, then return.

exercises.name: Plank Hold
exercises.description: Hold a straight-body position on elbows and toes, engaging your abs and glutes.

exercises.name: Guided Breathing & Stretch
exercises.description: Deep breathing paired with gentle stretches to calm the body and mind.
